name: baserow
description: Baserow is an open-source no-code database platform and Airtable alternative that allows users to build rich apps and collaborative databases via a spreadsheet-like interface. Self-hosted or SaaS options available.

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Real-time collaboration with team members. Work together

features.title: REST API
features.description: Programmatic access to your databases. Developer-friendly

features.title: Views & Filters
features.description: Multiple ways to view and organize data. Flexible visualization

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Complete control over your data and databases. Data sovereignty
